mapper.insert: insert into chat_room(room_name, master_id, total_people, public_open) values (#{room_name}, #{master_id}, #{total_people}, #{public_open});
mapper.select: select chat_room.room_id, chat_room.room_name, chat_room.total_people, chat_room.master_id from chat_room, user_account, chat_room_userinfo where chat_room.room_id=chat_room_userinfo.room_id AND #{id}=chat_room_userinfo.id group by room_id order by room_id;
select room_name from chat_room where room_id=#{room_id};
select master_id from chat_room where room_id=#{room_id};
mapper.update: update chat_room set total_people = total_people + #{people_num} where room_id=#{room_id};
